lexUnit.name: curl.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: something in the shape of a spiral or coil, especially a lock of hair.

sentence.text: However , it is misleading to date the portraits on that basis , as they are a naturalistic rendering of the appearance of boys after the loss of infant curls at the age of two or three .

He said nothing , letting her give vent to her distress , his thumb lightly stroking the silky curls at the nape of her neck .
Let's face it " he reached to smooth back the curtain of tousled gold curls from her eyes ` we hardly know each other .
